text: Crazy Mama is a 1975 American action comedy movie directed by Jonathan Demme and stars Cloris Leachman, Stuart Whitman, Linda Purl, Ann Sothern, Bill Paxton, Dennis Quaid, Sally Kirkland, John Milius. It was distributed by New World Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1975 action movies Category:1975 comedy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Demme
title: Crazy Mama
